name: 2 wheels 4 life
description:
This is a motocross game where you must fight hard and really show that you are a skilled driver to handle all the tracks , do you feel that you are a xtreme biker this might be the game for you .

On each level you have the opportunity to get bronze, silver, gold or platinum medal ... take you to the goal to unlock the next track .

On some tracks you'll need gold or better for the bike to get upgrade and improve, which is needed if you want to stand a chance to complete all tracks .

Upgrades: Top speed, acceleration, braking and rotation

Controls: A & D or left & right Arrow to gas and brake or rotate in midair + space to Bounce if you get stucked.

Now 24 courses and 24 platinum medals to earn, more coming soon ...

Do you have any suggestion or ideas or just want more levels , get in touch : http://freneticgamez.eu/contact.html
